inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getReplicationTask.

replicationTaskId.description:
The replication task identifier.

- Must contain from 1 to 255 alphanumeric characters or hyphens.
- First character must be a letter.
- Cannot end with a hyphen.
- Cannot contain two consecutive hyphens.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getReplicationTask.

cdcStartPosition.description: (Conflicts with `cdc_start_time`) Indicates when you want a change data capture (CDC) operation to start. The value can be in date, checkpoint, or LSN/SCN format depending on the source engine. For more information, see [Determining a CDC native start point](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/dms/latest/userguide/CHAP_Task.CDC.html#CHAP_Task.CDC.StartPoint.Native).

cdcStartTime.description: (Conflicts with `cdc_start_position`) The Unix timestamp integer for the start of the Change Data Capture (CDC) operation.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

migrationType.description: The migration type. Can be one of `full-load | cdc | full-load-and-cdc`.

replicationInstanceArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the replication instance.

replicationTaskArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the replication task.

replicationTaskSettings.description: An escaped JSON string that contains the task settings. For a complete list of task settings, see [Task Settings for AWS Database Migration Service Tasks](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/dms/latest/userguide/CHAP_Tasks.CustomizingTasks.TaskSettings.html).

sourceEndpointArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) string that uniquely identifies the source endpoint.

startReplicationTask.description: Whether to run or stop the replication task.

tableMappings.description: An escaped JSON string that contains the table mappings. For information on table mapping see [Using Table Mapping with an AWS Database Migration Service Task to Select and Filter Data](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/dms/latest/userguide/CHAP_Tasks.CustomizingTasks.TableMapping.html)

targetEndpointArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) string that uniquely identifies the target endpoint.
